name: Website Portfolio
content: A collection of custom-built websites developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue, and Tailwind CSS. Designed for speed, responsiveness, and modern aesthetics, each project showcases clean code, smooth animations, and a seamless user experience.

name: Innova Showcase Website
content: It is a inspired website from webflow. A modern, visually striking website showcasing architectural designs with HTML, CSS, Webflow, and GSAP. Featuring smooth animations, responsive layouts, and visuals to highlight innovative structures and design excellence.

name: Shoecase Cleaner Website
content: A shoe cleaner website website crafted using HTML, CSS, Webflow, and GSAP. Designed with smooth animations, responsive layouts, and aesthetic, it delivers an engaging, seamless, and visually user experience.

name: UI Designs
content: A showcase of user-friendly and visually appealing UI designs, created with a focus on aesthetics, usability, and seamless interaction. Each design reflects a perfect balance of creativity and functionality.

name: Video Creations
content: A dynamic collection of video edits featuring smooth transitions, engaging effects, and perfectly timed cuts. From high-energy montages to cinematic storytelling, each edit brings visuals to life with precision and creativity.
